verbs.description: [ARG1: French President Emmanuel Macron] [V: lands] [ARGM-LOC: in Washington] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-ADV: aiming to use his rapport with Donald Trump to take the edge off the latter ’s “ America First ” foreign policy , for Europe at least] .

[ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] lands in Washington Monday [V: aiming] [ARG1: to use his rapport with Donald Trump to take the edge off the latter ’s “ America First ” foreign policy , for Europe at least] .

[ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] lands in Washington Monday aiming to [V: use] [ARG1: his rapport with Donald Trump] [ARG2: to take the edge off the latter ’s “ America First ” foreign policy , for Europe at least] .

[ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] lands in Washington Monday aiming to use his rapport with Donald Trump to [V: take] [ARG1: the edge] [ARG2: off the latter ’s “ America First ” foreign policy] , [ARGM-ADV: for Europe at least] .
